ResourceHeader.ResourceName:
Radio JOVE HNRAO Dual Dipole Array + JOVE receiver
   20.1 MHz Stripchart Plots
ResourceHeader.Description:
Stripchart plots from output of the HNRAO Dual Dipole
   Array and JOVE receiver operating at 20.1 MHz. The plots
   are generated using the Radio-SkyPipe software. The Display Cadence will often
   vary but 24 Hours is a reasonable maximum value for the timespan of
   a single plot. The plots depict a single channel of data. The data is
   presented as Antenna Temperature in units of kiloKelvins. The date
   and the name of the observatory, HNRAO, is usually given across the
   top of the plot. Time is presented in Universal Time (UT).
